scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:development: cd client && npm install && npm run build:development
scripts.build:staging: cd client && npm install && npm run build:staging
scripts.deploy: gcloud config set project catdrop-prod && node generate-build.js && npm run build && gcloud app deploy
scripts.deploy:development: gcloud config set project catdrop-develop && node generate-build.js && npm run build:development && gcloud app deploy app.development.yaml
scripts.deploy:staging: gcloud config set project catdrop-staging && node generate-build.js && npm run build:staging && gcloud app deploy app.staging.yaml
scripts.commitlint: husky install && husky add .husky/commit-msg "npx --no -- commitlint  --config commitlint.config.cjs --edit $1"
